field.name: og_query_parameters
field.label: URL Query Parameters
field.description:
List of URL query parameter / value pairs to match for this object to apply. Example below would apply to the Joomla content view of Article 23:
option=com_content
view=article
id=23

field.name: og_open_graph_tags
field.label: Open Graph tags
field.description:
List of Open Graph parameter / values to apply to these types of pages. Example:
title=Title for These Pages
description=Description for any of these pages
image=Image for this type of page
